thread.title: BRIEF-Cefc Anhui's 2017 Net Profit Up But Swings To Red In Q1, Share Trade To Resume

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cefc Anhui's 2017 Net Profit Up But Swings To Red In Q1, Share Trade To Resume

organizations.name: reuters) - cefc anhui international holding co ltd

text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Cefc Anhui International Holding Co Ltd :
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 21.58 PERCENT Y/Y * SAYS IT SWINGS TO NET LOSS OF 68.8 MILLION YUAN ($10.86 million)IN Q1 VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 115.8 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON MAY 2 AFTER IT IMPLEMENTS DELISTING RISK WARNING Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FlNHa3 ; bit.ly/2r36OAD ; bit.ly/2Kk0xJI Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3353 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
